event.title: Children's Ministry Conference
event.intro: Mark your calendars for July 24-26, 2003! We will host our 3rd conference this year. Our conference theme is "Shine, Jesus, Shine" taken from Matthew 5:16. We want Jesus to shine through us as we serve Him by ministering to kids. Sign up today at the Events Center. For more information call Donna Cano (255-7756)
event.detail: Mark your calendars for July 24-26, 2003! We will host our 3rd conference this year. Our conference theme is "Shine, Jesus, Shine" taken from Matthew 5:16. We want Jesus to shine through us as we serve Him by ministering to kids. Guest speaker Gary Rodriguez from Calvary Chapel Old Bridge joins us this year. There will be an abundance of workshops with leaders sharing from their personal experiences. We desire to equip and encourage all those who work with children. Registration will begin in May. Call Donna Cano at the church for more info
